column2:
"We've spotted Baize readings.
Everyone nearby, that Baize's
destruction is priority number one!"

"The Baize's permeation status
is rising. Deal with it, fast."

"The Baize's permeation status is
still growing. Deal with it quickly."

"The Baize's permeation is critical!
This ain't good... Destroy it immediately!"

"The Baize's permeation has
reached critical mass... It's
exploding! Take cover!"

"Destruction of the Baize confirmed.
That was hard work, boys and girls."

"Confirming serious levels of toxic
rain following the Baize explosion. All
ARKS, find cover soon as possible!"

"The Baize will continue to grow
rapidly by feeding on surrounding
enemies. Stop it at all costs."

"Powerful reaction within the Baize
is confirmed. Exercise caution."
